entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Atikokan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:20 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Atikokan 10:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 65 %

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
